member.name: WICDdsFormatInfo
member.summary: Specifies the and block information of a DDS format.

member.name: WICDdsFormatInfo.BytesPerBlock
member.summary: The size of a single block in bytes. For values that are not block-based, the value is equal to the size of a single pixel in bytes.

member.name: WICDdsFormatInfo.BlockWidth
member.summary: The width of a single block in pixels. For values that are not block-based, the value is 1.

member.name: WICDdsFormatInfo.BlockHeight
member.summary: The height of a single block in pixels. For values that are not block-based, the value is 1.
